directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory contains the source code, assets, types, utility functions, and custom React hooks for a temporary "Todo" application project.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\assets` directory stores the asset files used in a temporary project build.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\components`, houses the source code for various components of a "Todo" application, including input, individual items, lists, filters, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\hooks`, contains the source code for custom React hooks used within a temporary project repository.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: This directory, `src\types`, stores type definitions for a software project.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and resources used by the project residing in the temporary repository `repo-3de5b94c-e6a4-4118-9bb2-b81430dc07bc-1750682493309`.
